EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Velocity_San Jose_Q217.Post Event Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for attending Velocity 2017 in San Jose
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello{{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Thanks for joining Pivotal at Velocity CA 2017 <[[https://conferences.oreilly.com/velocity/vl-ca]]>. We hope you came away inspired, with new insights on how startups and enterprises are building and managing complex, resilient, distributed systems. If you’d like to talk to us about arranging a hands-on workshop day in your offices or at a nearby hotel, simply inquire here <[[http://pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=velocity-2017]]> to begin a discussion.
In the meantime, if you’re looking for new ways to accelerate your journey into DevOps, cloud-native, microservices, containers, data and continuous delivery, our website has a wealth of articles <[[https://pivotal.io/topics?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=velocity-2017]]>, whitepapers <[[https://content.pivotal.io/resources?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=velocity-2017]]> and talks <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=velocity-2017]]> to get you started.
Some recent highlights can be found here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/velocity-2017?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=velocity-2017]]>.
Many of the excellent talks from the recent Cloud Foundry Summit <[[https://cloudfoundry.org/event_subpages/live/]]> are now available online <[[https://content.pivotal.io/cloud-foundry-summit-2017-2?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=velocity-2017]]>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team For more in depth presentations on cloud-native topics and everything else to do with delivering software, please join us again at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cf-summit-2017]]>, taking place December 4 - 7, 2017 in San Francisco. Use the code below for $100 off registration! S1P_EVENT_V100 <[[https://2017.springoneplatform.io/ehome/s1p/registration?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=velocity-2017]]>
